description: Main React component implementing the notes application front-end page, including state management, effects for data fetching, and UI rendering for notes, tags, and user interactions.

methods.name: bootstrap
methods.description: Fetches initial data: user info, tags, and notes; sets state accordingly.

methods.name: openCreate
methods.description: Opens modal to create a new note.

methods.name: openEdit
methods.description: Opens modal to edit an existing note.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles saving of a note, either creating or updating.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note after user confirmation.
